mapper.sql: repository_id, issue_id, summary, assignee, reporter, status, resolution, created, updated
mapper.insert:
insert into issue_bug (repository_id, issue_id, summary, assignee, reporter, status, resolution, created, updated) values
(#{item.repositoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.issueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into issue_bug
repository_id,
issue_id,
summary,
assignee,
reporter,
status,
resolution,
created,
updated,
#{repositoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update issue_bug
summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assignee = #{assignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reporter = #{reporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resolution = #{resolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where repository_id = #{repositoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and issue_id = #{issueId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
